tasks.title: Generate Onboarding Context Module
tasks.description: Create a memory and logic module that allows LLMs to summarize core concepts and artifacts automatically.

tasks.title: Link Onboarding Content to Router and Reflections
tasks.description: Ensure onboarding docs are routable and accessible by any agent reflection engine.

tasks.title: Summarize Project Docs into Agent Memory Entries
tasks.description: UX agent summarizes onboarding documents and key frameworks into long-term memory with routable IDs.
